headline.print_headline: U.S. Uses State Secrets Law to Intervene in Iran-Related Lawsuit
headline.main: U.S. Uses State Secrets Law to Intervene in Iran-Related Lawsuit

lead_paragraph: The U.S. government has moved to invoke a powerful national security law to dismiss a private lawsuit against a non-profit group, United Against A Nuclear Iran, on grounds that the case could reveal state secrets, according to a court filing on Friday.
